atk-abh02a14:3_3: Yasmā pana parato atthe ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidātiādimāha, tasmā na aññassa kassaci pabhedā, ñāṇasseva pabhedāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a14:3_4: Iti ‘‘catasso paṭisambhidā’’ti padena cattāro ñāṇappabhedāti ayamattho saṅgahito.
atk-abh02a14:3_8: Dhammappabhedassa hi sallakkhaṇavibhāvanāvavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṁ dhamme pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā nāma.
atk-abh02a14:3_9: Niruttippabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanāvavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṁ niruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ niruttipaṭisambhidā nāma.
atk-abh02a14:3_10: Paṭibhānappabhedassa sallakkhaṇavibhāvanāvavatthānakaraṇasamatthaṁ paṭibhāne pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā nāma.
atk-abh02a14:4_0: Idāni yathānikkhittā paṭisambhidā bhājetvā dassento atthe ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a14:4_2: Tañhi hetuvasena araṇīyaṁ gantabbaṁ pattabbaṁ, tasmā atthoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a14:4_3: Pabhedato pana yaṁkiñci paccayasamuppannaṁ, nibbānaṁ, bhāsitattho, vipāko, kiriyāti ime pañca dhammā atthoti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a14:4_4: Taṁ atthaṁ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṁ atthe pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā.
atk-abh02a14:5_1: So hi yasmā taṁ taṁ vidahati pavatteti ceva pāpeti ca, tasmā dhammoti vuccati.
atk-abh02a14:5_2: Pabhedato pana yo koci phalanibbattako hetu, ariyamaggo, bhāsitaṁ , kusalaṁ, akusalanti ime pañca dhammā dhammoti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a14:5_3: Taṁ dhammaṁ paccavekkhantassa tasmiṁ dhamme pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā.
atk-abh02a14:6_0: Tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṁ atthe ca dhamme ca yā sabhāvanirutti, tassā abhilāpe taṁ sabhāvaniruttiṁ saddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṁ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ niruttipaṭisambhidā.
atk-abh02a14:6_1: Evamayaṁ niruttipaṭisambhidā saddārammaṇā nāma jātā, na paññattiārammaṇā. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a14:6_2: Yasmā saddaṁ sutvā ‘‘ayaṁ sabhāvanirutti, ayaṁ na sabhāvaniruttī’’ti jānanti.
atk-abh02a14:6_3: Paṭisambhidāppatto hi ‘‘phasso’’ti vutte ‘‘ayaṁ sabhāvaniruttī’’ti jānāti, ‘‘phassā’’ti vā ‘‘phassa’’nti vā vutte pana ‘‘ayaṁ na sabhāvaniruttī’’ti jānāti.
atk-abh02a14:6_5: Aññaṁ panesa nāmaākhyātaupasaggabyañjanasaddaṁ jānāti na jānātīti?
atk-abh02a14:6_6: Yadaggena saddaṁ sutvā ‘‘ayaṁ sabhāvanirutti, ayaṁ na sabhāvaniruttī’’ti jānāti, tadaggena tampi jānissatīti.
atk-abh02a14:6_7: Taṁ pana nayidaṁ paṭisambhidākiccanti paṭikkhipitvā idaṁ vatthu kathitaṁ –
atk-abh02a14:7_0: Tissadattatthero kira bodhimaṇḍe suvaṇṇasalākaṁ gahetvā aṭṭhārasasu bhāsāsu ‘katarabhāsāya kathemī’ti pavāresi.
atk-abh02a14:7_1: Taṁ pana tena attano uggahe ṭhatvā pavāritaṁ, na paṭisambhidāya ṭhitena.
atk-abh02a14:7_2: So hi mahāpaññatāya taṁ taṁ bhāsaṁ kathāpetvā kathāpetvā uggaṇhi;
atk-abh02a14:8_0: Bhāsaṁ nāma sattā uggaṇhantīti vatvā ca panettha idaṁ kathitaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:8_1: Mātāpitaro hi daharakāle kumārake mañce vā pīṭhe vā nipajjāpetvā taṁ taṁ kathayamānā tāni tāni kiccāni karonti.
atk-abh02a14:8_2: Dārakā tesaṁ taṁ taṁ bhāsaṁ vavatthāpenti –
atk-abh02a14:8_3: iminā idaṁ vuttaṁ, iminā idaṁ vuttanti.
atk-abh02a14:8_4: Gacchante gacchante kāle sabbampi bhāsaṁ jānanti.
atk-abh02a14:8_6: Tesaṁ jāto dārako sace mātukathaṁ paṭhamaṁ suṇāti, damiḷabhāsaṁ bhāsissati;
atk-abh02a14:8_7: sace pitukathaṁ paṭhamaṁ suṇāti, andhakabhāsaṁ bhāsissati.
atk-abh02a14:8_8: Ubhinnampi pana kathaṁ assuṇanto māgadhabhāsaṁ bhāsissati.
atk-abh02a14:9_0: Yopi agāmake mahāraññe nibbatto, tattha añño kathento nāma natthi, sopi attano dhammatāya vacanaṁ samuṭṭhāpento māgadhabhāsameva bhāsissati.
atk-abh02a14:9_1: Niraye, tiracchānayoniyaṁ, pettivisaye, manussaloke, devaloketi sabbattha māgadhabhāsāva ussannā.
atk-abh02a14:9_2: Tattha sesā oṭṭakirātaandhakayonakadamiḷabhāsādikā aṭṭhārasa bhāsā parivattanti .
atk-abh02a14:9_4: Sammāsabuddhopi tepiṭakaṁ buddhavacanaṁ tantiṁ āropento māgadhabhāsāya eva āropesi. Kasmā?
atk-abh02a14:9_6: Māgadhabhāsāya hi tantiṁ āruḷhassa buddhavacanassa paṭisambhidāppattānaṁ sotapathāgamanameva papañco;
atk-abh02a14:9_7: sote pana saṅghaṭṭitamatteyeva nayasatena nayasahassena attho upaṭṭhāti.
atk-abh02a14:9_8: Aññāya pana bhāsāya tantiṁ āruḷhaṁ pothetvā pothetvā uggahetabbaṁ hoti.
atk-abh02a14:9_9: Bahumpi uggahetvā pana puthujjanassa paṭisambhidāppatti nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a14:10_0: Ñāṇesu ñāṇanti sabbatthakañāṇaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā ñāṇaṁ paccavekkhantassa pabhedagataṁ ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
atk-abh02a14:10_1: Imā pana catassopi paṭisambhidā dvīsu ṭhānesu pabhedaṁ gacchanti, pañcahi kāraṇehi visadā hontīti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a14:10_4: Tattha sāriputtattherassa mahāmoggallānattherassa mahākassapattherassa mahākaccāyanattherassa mahākoṭṭhitattherassāti asītiyāpi mahātherānaṁ paṭisambhidā asekkhabhūmiyaṁ pabhedaṁ gatā.
atk-abh02a14:10_5: Ānandattherassa cittassa gahapatino dhammikassa upāsakassa upālissa gahapatino khujjuttarāya upāsikāyāti evamādīnaṁ paṭisambhidā sekkhabhūmiyaṁ pabhedaṁ gatāti imāsu dvīsu bhūmīsu pabhedaṁ gacchanti.
atk-abh02a14:11_0: Katamehi pañcahi kāraṇehi paṭisambhidā visadā hontīti?
atk-abh02a14:11_7: Sakkaccañhi dhammaṁ suṇantassa paṭisambhidā visadā honti.
atk-abh02a14:11_9: Uggahitapāḷiyā atthaṁ kathentassa hi paṭisambhidā visadā honti.
atk-abh02a14:11_12: Tattha arahattappattiyā punabbasukuṭumbikaputtassa tissattherassa paṭisambhidā visadā ahesuṁ.
atk-abh02a14:11_13: So kira tambapaṇṇidīpe buddhavacanaṁ uggaṇhitvā paratīraṁ gantvā yonakadhammarakkhitattherassa santike buddhavacanaṁ uggaṇhitvā āgacchanto nāvaṁ abhiruhanatitthe ekasmiṁ pade uppannakaṅkho yojanasatamaggaṁ nivattitvā ācariyassa santikaṁ gacchanto antarāmagge ekassa kuṭumbikassa pañhaṁ kathesi.
atk-abh02a14:11_16: Thero vāsiyā koṭṭetvā nisīdanaṭṭhāne paribhaṇḍaṁ kāresi.
atk-abh02a14:11_20: ‘‘amhākaṁ gatamaggaṁ āvajjetvā anāgate sabrahmacārino paṭipattiṁ pūretabbaṁ maññissantī’’ti.
atk-abh02a14:11_21: Tissattheropi ācariyassa santike kaṅkhaṁ chinditvā jambukolapaṭṭane oruyha cetiyaṅgaṇaṁ sammajjanavelāya vālikavihāraṁ patvā sammajji.
atk-abh02a14:11_22: Tassa sammajjitaṭṭhānaṁ disvā ‘idaṁ vītarāgassa bhikkhuno sammaṭṭhaṭṭhāna’nti therassa vīmaṁsanatthāya pañhaṁ pucchiṁsu.
atk-abh02a14:12_0: Pariyattiyā pana tissadattattherassa ceva nāgasenattherassa ca paṭisambhidā visadā ahesuṁ.
atk-abh02a14:12_2: So kira talaṅgaravāsī dhammadinnattherassa bhāgineyyo khuraggeyeva arahattaṁ patto mātulattherassa dhammavinicchayaṭṭhāne nisīditvā suṇantoyeva tīṇi piṭakāni paguṇāni akāsi.
atk-abh02a14:12_3: Uggahitapāḷiyā atthaṁ kathentassa pana tissadattattherassa eva paṭisambhidā visadā ahesuṁ.
atk-abh02a14:12_4: Gatapaccāgatavattaṁ pana pūretvā yāva anulomaṁ kammaṭṭhānaṁ ussukkāpetvā āgatānaṁ visadabhāvappattapaṭisambhidānaṁ pubbayogāvacarānaṁ anto natthi.
atk-abh02a14:13_0: Etesu pana kāraṇesu pariyatti, savanaṁ, paripucchāti imāni tīṇi pabhedasseva balavakāraṇāni.
atk-abh02a14:13_1: Pubbayogo adhigamassa balavapaccayo, pabhedassa hoti na hotīti?
atk-abh02a14:13_3: Pariyattisavanaparipucchā hi pubbe hontu vā mā vā, pubbayogena pubbe ceva etarahi ca saṅkhārasammasanaṁ vinā paṭisambhidā nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a14:13_4: Ime pana dvepi ekato hutvā paṭisambhidā upatthambhetvā visadā karontīti.
atk-abh02a14:16_1: Idāni ye saṅgahavāre pañca atthā ca dhammā ca saṅgahitā, tesaṁ pabhedadassananayena paṭisambhidā vibhajituṁ puna catassotiādinā nayena pabhedavāro āraddho.
atk-abh02a14:16_3: Tattha paccayasamuppannassa dukkhasaccassa paccayena pattabbassa nibbānassa ca atthabhāvaṁ, phalanibbattakassa samudayassa nibbānasampāpakassa ariyamaggassa ca dhammabhāvañca dassetuṁ ‘saccavāro’ vutto.
atk-abh02a14:16_4: Yassa kassaci pana hetuphalanibbattakassa hetuno dhammabhāvaṁ, hetuphalassa ca atthabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘hetuvāro’ vutto.
atk-abh02a14:16_5: Tattha ca hetuphalakkamavasena uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā niddiṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a14:16_6: Ye pana dhammā tamhā tamhā rūpārūpappabhedā hetuto jātā, tesaṁ atthabhāvaṁ, tassa tassa ca rūpārūpadhammappabhedassa hetuno dhammabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘dhammavāro’ vutto.
atk-abh02a14:16_7: Jarāmaraṇādīnaṁ pana atthabhāvaṁ, jarāmaraṇādisamudayasaṅkhātānaṁ jātiādīnañca dhammabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘paccayākāravāro’ vutto.
atk-abh02a14:16_8: Tato pariyattisaṅkhātassa tassa tassa bhāsitassa dhammabhāvaṁ, bhāsitasaṅkhātena paccayena pattabbassa bhāsitatthassa ca atthabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ ‘pariyattivāro’ vutto.
atk-abh02a14:17_0: Tattha ca yasmā bhāsitaṁ ñatvā tassattho ñāyati, tasmā bhāsitabhāsitatthakkamena uppaṭipāṭiyā paṭhamaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā niddiṭṭhā.
atk-abh02a14:17_1: Pariyattidhammassa ca pabhedadassanatthaṁ ‘‘tattha katamā dhammapaṭisambhidā’’ti pucchāpubbaṅgamo paṭiniddesavāro vutto.
atk-abh02a14:17_2: Tattha suttantiādīhi navahi aṅgehi nippadesato tanti gahitā.
atk-abh02a14:17_3: Ayaṁ imassa bhāsitassa attho, ayaṁ imassa bhāsitassa atthoti imasmimpi ṭhāne bhāsitavasena nippadesato tanti eva gahitāti.
atk-abh02a14:20_3: Sā hi nibbānārammaṇānaṁ maggaphalañāṇānaṁ vasena lokuttarāpi hoti.
atk-abh02a14:20_4: Abhidhammabhājanīye kusalākusalavipākakiriyānaṁ vasena catūhi vārehi vibhattaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:20_6: 1 ādayo) kusalacittāni vibhattāni, tesaṁ sabbesampi vasena ekekasmiṁ cittaniddese catasso catasso paṭisambhidā vibhattāti veditabbā.
atk-abh02a14:20_8: Vipākakiriyavāresu vipākakiriyānaṁ atthena saṅgahitattā, dhammapaṭisambhidaṁ chaḍḍetvā, ekekasmiṁ vipākacitte ca kiriyacitte ca tisso tissova paṭisambhidā vibhattā.
atk-abh02a14:21_0: Kasmā pana yathā kusalākusalavāresu ‘‘tesaṁ vipāke ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā’’ti vuttaṁ, evamidha ‘‘yesaṁ dhammānaṁ ime vipākā, tesu ñāṇaṁ dhammapaṭisambhidā’’ti evaṁ na vuttanti?
atk-abh02a14:21_2: Yadi evaṁ, ‘‘tesaṁ vipāke ñāṇaṁ atthapaṭisambhidā’’ti heṭṭhā vuttattā ayaṁ atthapaṭisambhidāpi idha na vattabbā siyāti?
atk-abh02a14:21_5: Kiriyavāre ca ‘‘yesaṁ dhammānaṁ ime kiriyā’’ti vacanameva na yujjatīti dvīsupi imesu vāresu tisso tissova paṭisambhidā vibhattā.
atk-abh02a14:22_0: Tattha yāya niruttiyā tesaṁ dhammānaṁ paññatti hotīti yāya niruttiyā tesaṁ phasso hotītiādinā nayena vuttānaṁ dhammānaṁ ‘‘ayaṁ phasso, ayaṁ vedanā’’ti evaṁ paññatti hoti.
atk-abh02a14:22_1: Tattha dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇanti tasmiṁ atthe dhamme ca pavattamānāya tassā dhammaniruttiyā sabhāvapaññattiyā abhilāpe ñāṇaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:22_2: Abhilāpasaddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā uppannañāṇameva idhāpi kathitaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:22_4: Tāniñāṇāni jānātīti itarāni tīṇi paṭisambhidāñāṇāni jānāti.
atk-abh02a14:23_0: Idāni yathā yaṁ ñāṇaṁ tāni ñāṇāni jānāti, tathā tassa tesu pavattiṁ dassetuṁ imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:23_1: Tattha idamatthajotakānīti imassa atthassa jotakāni pakāsakāni;
atk-abh02a14:23_2: imaṁ nāma atthaṁ jotenti pakāsenti paricchindantīti attho.
atk-abh02a14:23_3: Iti ñāṇesu ñāṇanti iminā ākārena pavattaṁ tīsu ñāṇesu ñāṇaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā nāma.
atk-abh02a14:24_0: Tattha kiñcāpi ayaṁ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā ‘imissā idaṁ kiccaṁ, imissā idaṁ kicca’nti itarāsaṁ paṭisambhidānaṁ kiccaṁ jānāti, sayaṁ pana tāsaṁ kiccaṁ kātuṁ na sakkoti, bahussutadhammakathiko viya appassutadhammakathikassa.
atk-abh02a14:24_4: Tattha appassuto sarasampanno ahosi, itaro mandassaro.
atk-abh02a14:24_5: Tesu appassuto gatagataṭṭhāne attano sarasampattiyā sakalaparisaṁ khobhetvā dhammaṁ kathesi.
atk-abh02a14:24_7: ‘yathā esa dhammaṁ kathesi, eko tipiṭakadharo maññe bhavissatī’ti vadanti.
atk-abh02a14:24_9: ‘dhammasavane jānissatha ayaṁ tipiṭakadharo vā no vā’ti āha.
atk-abh02a14:24_10: So kiñcāpi evamāha, yathā pana sakalaparisaṁ khobhetvā dhammaṁ kathetuṁ sakkoti, evamassa kathanasamatthatā natthi.
atk-abh02a14:24_11: Tattha kiñcāpi paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā, bahussuto viya appassutassa, itarāsaṁ kiccaṁ jānāti, sayaṁ pana taṁ kiccaṁ kātuṁ na sakkotīti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:25_1: Evaṁ kusalacittuppādādivasena paṭisambhidā vibhajitvā idāni tāsaṁ uppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṁ khettaṁ dassetuṁ puna catasso paṭisambhidātiādimāha.
atk-abh02a14:25_2: Tattha tisso paṭisambhidā kāmāvacarakusalato catūsu ñāṇasampayuttesu cittuppādesūti idaṁ sekkhānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:25_3: Tesañhipi dhammapaccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttaṁ pañcappakāraṁ dhammaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakusalacittesu dhammapaṭisambhidā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a14:25_4: Tathā niruttipaccavekkhaṇakāle saddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā niruttipaṭisambhidā;
atk-abh02a14:25_5: ñāṇaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle sabbatthakañāṇaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
atk-abh02a14:26_0: Kiriyato catūsūti idaṁ pana asekkhānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:26_1: Tesañhi dhammaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttaṁ pañcappakāraṁ dhammaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittesu dhammapaṭisambhidā uppajjati.
atk-abh02a14:26_2: Tathā niruttipaccavekkhaṇakāle saddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā niruttipaṭisambhidā;
atk-abh02a14:26_3: ñāṇaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle sabbatthakañāṇaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti.
atk-abh02a14:27_0: Atthapaṭisambhidā etesu ceva uppajjatīti idaṁ pana sekkhāsekkhānaṁ vasena vuttaṁ.
atk-abh02a14:27_1: Tathā hi sekkhānaṁ atthapaccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttappabhedaṁ atthaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakusalacittesu ayaṁ uppajjati, maggaphalakāle ca maggaphalesu.
atk-abh02a14:27_2: Asekkhassa pana atthaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle heṭṭhā vuttappabhedameva atthaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā catūsu ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittesu uppajjati, phalakāle ca uparime sāmaññaphaleti.
atk-abh02a14:27_3: Evametā sekkhāsekkhānaṁ uppajjamānā imāsu bhūmīsu uppajjantīti bhūmidassanatthaṁ ayaṁ nayo dassitoti.
atk-abh02a14:30_1: Pañhāpucchake pāḷianusāreneva catunnaṁ paṭisambhidānaṁ kusalādibhāvo veditabbo.
atk-abh02a14:30_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana niruttipaṭisambhidā saddameva ārammaṇaṁ karotīti parittārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:30_3: Atthapaṭisambhidā kāmāvacaravipākakiriyasaṅkhātañceva paccayasamuppannañca atthaṁ paccavekkhantassa parittārammaṇā;
atk-abh02a14:30_6: Dhammapaṭisambhidā kāmāvacaraṁ kusaladhammaṁ akusaladhammaṁ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa parittārammaṇā;
atk-abh02a14:30_7: rūpāvacarārūpāvacaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa mahaggatārammaṇā ;
atk-abh02a14:30_8: lokuttaraṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa appamāṇārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:30_10: rūpāvacarārūpāvacarāni kusalavipākakiriyañāṇāni paccavekkhantassa tesaṁ ārammaṇāni vijānantassa mahaggatārammaṇā;
atk-abh02a14:31_0: Atthapaṭisambhidā sahajātahetuvasena siyā maggahetukā, vīriyajeṭṭhikāya maggabhāvanāya siyā maggādhipati, chandacittajeṭṭhikāya navattabbā, phalakālepi navattabbā eva.
atk-abh02a14:31_1: Dhammapaṭisambhidā maggaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle maggārammaṇā, maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhantassa ārammaṇādhipativasena maggādhipati.
atk-abh02a14:31_2: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā maggañāṇaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle maggārammaṇā, maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhantassa maggādhipati, sesañāṇaṁ pañcavekkhaṇakāle navattabbārammaṇā .
atk-abh02a14:31_3: Niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannameva saddaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karotīti paccuppannārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:32_0: Atthapaṭisambhidā atītaṁ vipākatthaṁ kiriyatthaṁ paccayasamuppannañca paccavekkhantassa atītārammaṇā, anāgataṁ paccavekkhantassa anāgatārammaṇā, paccuppannaṁ paccavekkhantassa paccuppannārammaṇā, lokuttaraṁ paramatthaṁ paccavekkhantassa navattabbārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:32_1: Dhammapaṭisambhidā atītaṁ kusalaṁ akusalaṁ paccayadhammañca paccavekkhantassa atītārammaṇā, anāgataṁ paccavekkhantassa anāgatārammaṇā, paccuppannaṁ paccavekkhantassa paccuppannārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:32_2: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā atītaṁ kusalañāṇaṁ vipākañāṇaṁ kiriyañāṇañca paccavekkhantassa atītārammaṇā, anāgataṁ paccavekkhantassa anāgatārammaṇā, paccuppannaṁ paccavekkhantassa paccuppannārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:33_1: Itarāsu tīsu atthapaṭisambhidā ajjhattaṁ vipākatthaṁ kiriyatthaṁ paccayasamuppannañca paccavekkhantassa ajjhattārammaṇā, bahiddhā paccavekkhantassa bahiddhārammaṇā, ajjhattabahiddhā paccavekkhantassa ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā , paramatthaṁ paccavekkhantassa bahiddhārammaṇā eva.
atk-abh02a14:33_2: Dhammapaṭisambhidā ajjhattaṁ kusalākusalaṁ paccayadhammaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle ajjhattārammaṇā, bahiddhā kusalākusalaṁ paccayadhammaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle bahiddhārammaṇā, ajjhattabahiddhā kusalākusalaṁ paccayadhammaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle ajjhattabahiddhārammaṇā.
atk-abh02a14:33_3: Paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā ajjhattaṁ kusalavipākakiriyañāṇaṁ paccavekkhaṇakāle ajjhattārammaṇā, bahiddhā…pe…
atk-abh02a14:34_2: Imasmiñhi paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge sammāsambuddhena tayopi nayā lokiyalokuttaramissakattā ekaparicchedāva kathitā.
atk-abh02a14:34_3: Tīsupi hi etāsu tisso paṭisambhidā lokiyā, atthapaṭisambhidā lokiyalokuttarāti.
atk-abh02a14:34_4: Evamayaṁ paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṁ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
